events.name: Pirate Ambush!
events.description: A pirate vessel decloaks off your starboard bow. They're demanding tribute or they'll take it by force.

outcome.message: You transfer the credits. The pirates salute mockingly and warp away.

outcome_success.message: Full power to engines! You barely escape their tractor beam.

outcome_failure.message: They catch you and ransack your cargo hold. Half your goods are gone.

events.name: Floating Salvage
events.description: Your sensors detect debris from a destroyed freighter. There might be salvageable cargo.

outcome_success.message: Jackpot! You haul in some valuable salvage.

outcome_failure.message: Nothing but junk. You wasted fuel searching through debris.

outcome.message: Better safe than sorry. You continue on your way.

events.name: Distress Signal
events.description: A weak distress signal reaches your ship. Someone's stranded out there.

outcome_success.message: You rescue a wealthy merchant who rewards you handsomely!

outcome_failure.message: It was a trap! Pirates ambush you and steal your credits.

outcome.message: You feel a pang of guilt, but space is dangerous. You fly on.

events.name: Fuel Leak!
events.description: Warning lights flash! You've got a fuel leak in the main tank.

outcome_success.message: You manage to seal the leak with duct tape and prayers.

outcome_failure.message: The patch fails. You lose a lot of fuel before sealing it properly.

outcome.message: You use proper repair materials. The leak is sealed safely.

events.name: Merchant Convoy
events.description: You encounter a friendly merchant convoy. They're willing to trade at favorable rates.

outcome.message: You make some excellent deals with the convoy merchants.
You share news and coordinates. They wave as they pass.

events.name: Ion Storm
events.description: A sudden ion storm engulfs your ship! Systems are going haywire.

outcome_success.message: Your ship holds together. You emerge on the other side safely.

outcome_failure.message: Systems damaged! You spend credits and fuel on emergency repairs.

outcome.message: You detour around the storm, burning extra fuel.

events.name: Hidden Cache
events.description: Your scanner picks up an anomaly on a nearby asteroid. Could be a smuggler's cache!

outcome_success.message: You find a hidden stash of credits! Someone will miss this...

outcome.message: You mark the coordinates and continue on. Maybe later.

events.name: Customs Patrol
events.description: A government patrol vessel is hailing you for a routine inspection.

outcome.message: They scan your cargo and find everything in order. You're cleared to proceed.

outcome_success.message: You slip into an asteroid field and lose them. That was close!

outcome_failure.message: They catch you and fine you heavily for evading inspection.

events.name: Lucky Star
events.description: You pass through the tail of a comet. Spacers say it brings good luck!

outcome.message: You find a credit chip stuck in your ventilation system. Lucky indeed!

events.name: Engine Trouble
events.description: Your engine starts making concerning noises. Something's not right.

outcome_success.message: You make it, barely. The engine will need maintenance soon.

outcome_failure.message: The engine fails catastrophically! Emergency repairs drain your resources.

choices.text: Stop and fix it now (-200 credits)

outcome.message: You spend time and money on proper repairs. Ship's running smooth now.
